text: Egha Iesus mɨgɨa ghua ghaze, “Nɨn aveghbuam arazir kuram nɨ damightɨma, nɨ an bighan mangɨ egh gua uaningra ikɨva nɨ a ko gua bizir kam anekɨrigh. A nɨ baragham, eghtɨ nɨ ua uan aveghbuam inigham.(18:15) Vezɨn kamɨn itir mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevim, “nɨ damightɨma,” fofozir gumazir maba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, gumazir ti igharazim an osiri. Matyu uabɨ puvatɨ.
